text: I'm sorry for the times I didn't listen closely enough when you needed to be heard.
I'm sorry for moments when my words hurt when they should have healed.
I'm sorry for the times I was too caught up in myself to see what you needed.
I'm sorry for not always showing you how much you mean to me in the ways you deserved.
I'm sorry for the silences when you needed reassurance.
I'm sorry for every tear I caused that could have been prevented with more care.
I'm sorry for the times I took you for granted instead of celebrating your presence.
I'm sorry for not always being patient when you needed understanding.
